info.title: ServiceBusManagementClient
info.description: Azure Service Bus client for managing Queues, Topics, and Subscriptions.

ApiVersion.name: api-version
ApiVersion.description: Specifies the version of the REST protocol used for processing the request. This is required when using shared key authorization.

Endpoint.name: endpoint
Endpoint.description: The Service Bus fully qualified domain name.

Enrich.name: enrich
Enrich.description: A query parameter that sets enrich to true or false.

rights.description: Access rights of the entity. Values are 'Send', 'Listen', or 'Manage'

createdTime.description: The date and time when the authorization rule was created.

modifiedTime.description: The date and time when the authorization rule was modified.

primaryKey.description: The primary key of the authorization rule

secondaryKey.description: The primary key of the authorization rule

CreateQueueBody.description: The request body for creating a queue.

CreateTopicBody.description: The request body for creating a topic.

CreateSubscriptionBody.description: The request body for creating a subscription.

CreateRuleBody.description: The request body for creating a rule.

EntityStatus.description: Status of a Service Bus resource

MessageCountDetails.description: Details about the message counts in entity.

activeMessageCount.description: Number of active messages in the queue, topic, or subscription.

deadLetterMessageCount.description: Number of messages that are dead lettered.

transferDeadLetterMessageCount.description: Number of messages transferred into dead letters.

transferMessageCount.description: Number of messages transferred to another queue, topic, or subscription.

MessagingSku.description: The SKU for the messaging entity.

NamespaceProperties.description: The metadata related to a Service Bus namespace.

alias.description: Alias for the geo-disaster recovery Service Bus namespace.

createdTime.description: The exact time the namespace was created.

messagingUnits.description: The number of messaging units allocated to the namespace.

modifiedTime.description: The exact time the namespace was last modified.

NamespacePropertiesEntry.description: Represents an entry in the feed when querying namespace info

id.description: The URL of the GET request

updated.description: The timestamp for when this namespace was last updated

type.description: Type of content in namespace info response

NamespaceType.description: The type of entities the namespace can contain.

QueueDescription.description: Description of a Service Bus queue resource.

lockDuration.description: ISO 8601 timespan duration of a peek-lock; that is, the amount of time that the message is locked for other receivers. The maximum value for LockDuration is 5 minutes; the default value is 1 minute.

maxSizeInMegabytes.description: The maximum size of the queue in megabytes, which is the size of memory allocated for the queue.

requiresDuplicateDetection.description: A value indicating if this queue requires duplicate detection.

requiresSession.description: A value that indicates whether the queue supports the concept of sessions.

defaultMessageTimeToLive.description: ISO 8601 default message timespan to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to Service Bus. This is the default value used when TimeToLive is not set on a message itself.

deadLetteringOnMessageExpiration.description: A value that indicates whether this queue has dead letter support when a message expires.

duplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow.description: ISO 8601 timeSpan structure that defines the duration of the duplicate detection history. The default value is 10 minutes.

maxDeliveryCount.description: The maximum delivery count. A message is automatically deadlettered after this number of deliveries. Default value is 10.

enableBatchedOperations.description: Value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled.

sizeInBytes.description: The size of the queue, in bytes.

messageCount.description: The number of messages in the queue.

isAnonymousAccessible.description: A value indicating if the resource can be accessed without authorization.

forwardTo.description: The name of the recipient entity to which all the messages sent to the queue are forwarded to.

userMetadata.description: Custom metdata that user can associate with the description. Max length is 1024 chars.

createdAt.description: The exact time the queue was created.

updatedAt.description: The exact time the entity description was last updated.

accessedAt.description: Last time a message was sent, or the last time there was a receive request to this queue.

supportOrdering.description: A value that indicates whether the queue supports ordering.

autoDeleteOnIdle.description: ISO 8601 timeSpan idle interval after which the queue is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.

enablePartitioning.description: A value that indicates whether the queue is to be partitioned across multiple message brokers.

enableExpress.description: A value that indicates whether Express Entities are enabled. An express queue holds a message in memory temporarily before writing it to persistent storage.

forwardDeadLetteredMessagesTo.description: The name of the recipient entity to which all the dead-lettered messages of this subscription are forwarded to.

QueueDescriptionEntry.description: Represents an entry in the feed when querying queues

id.description: The URL of the GET request

published.description: The timestamp for when this queue was published

updated.description: The timestamp for when this queue was last updated

type.description: Type of content in queue response

QueueDescriptionFeed.description: Response from listing Service Bus queues.

id.description: URL of the list queues query.

title.description: The entity type for the feed.

ResponseAuthor.description: The author that created this resource

ResponseLink.description: The URL for the HTTP request

href.description: The URL of the GET request

rel.description: What the link href is relative to

ServiceBusManagementError.description: The error response from Service Bus.

TopicDescription.description: Description of a Service Bus topic resource.

defaultMessageTimeToLive.description: ISO 8601 default message timespan to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to Service Bus. This is the default value used when TimeToLive is not set on a message itself.

maxSizeInMegabytes.description: The maximum size of the topic in megabytes, which is the size of memory allocated for the topic.

requiresDuplicateDetection.description: A value indicating if this topic requires duplicate detection.

duplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow.description: ISO 8601 timeSpan structure that defines the duration of the duplicate detection history. The default value is 10 minutes.

enableBatchedOperations.description: Value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled.

sizeInBytes.description: The size of the topic, in bytes.

isAnonymousAccessible.description: A value indicating if the resource can be accessed without authorization.

createdAt.description: The exact time the topic was created.

updatedAt.description: The exact time a message was updated in the topic.

accessedAt.description: Last time a message was sent, or the last time there was a receive request to this topic.

supportOrdering.description: A value that indicates whether the topic supports ordering.

subscriptionCount.description: The number of subscriptions in the topic.

autoDeleteOnIdle.description: ISO 8601 timeSpan idle interval after which the topic is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.

enablePartitioning.description: A value that indicates whether the topic is to be partitioned across multiple message brokers.

enableSubscriptionPartitioning.description: A value that indicates whether the topic's subscription is to be partitioned.

enableExpress.description: A value that indicates whether Express Entities are enabled. An express topic holds a message in memory temporarily before writing it to persistent storage.

TopicDescriptionEntry.description: Represents an entry in the feed when querying topics

id.description: The URL of the GET request

published.description: The timestamp for when this topic was published

updated.description: The timestamp for when this topic was last updated

type.description: Type of content in topic response

TopicDescriptionFeed.description: Response from listing Service Bus topics.

id.description: URL of the list topics query.

title.description: The entity type for the feed.

SubscriptionDescription.description: Description of a Service Bus subscription resource.

lockDuration.description: ISO 8601 timespan duration of a peek-lock; that is, the amount of time that the message is locked for other receivers. The maximum value for LockDuration is 5 minutes; the default value is 1 minute.

requiresSession.description: A value that indicates whether the subscription supports the concept of sessions.

defaultMessageTimeToLive.description: ISO 8601 default message timespan to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to Service Bus. This is the default value used when TimeToLive is not set on a message itself.

deadLetteringOnMessageExpiration.description: A value that indicates whether this subscription has dead letter support when a message expires.

deadLetteringOnFilterEvaluationException.description: A value that indicates whether this subscription has dead letter support when a message expires.

messageCount.description: The number of messages in the subscription.

maxDeliveryCount.description: The maximum delivery count. A message is automatically deadlettered after this number of deliveries. Default value is 10.

enableBatchedOperations.description: Value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled.

forwardTo.description: The name of the recipient entity to which all the messages sent to the subscription are forwarded to.

createdAt.description: The exact time the subscription was created.

updatedAt.description: The exact time a message was updated in the subscription.

accessedAt.description: Last time a message was sent, or the last time there was a receive request to this subscription.

userMetadata.description: Metadata associated with the subscription. Maximum number of characters is 1024.

forwardDeadLetteredMessagesTo.description: The name of the recipient entity to which all the messages sent to the subscription are forwarded to.

autoDeleteOnIdle.description: ISO 8601 timeSpan idle interval after which the subscription is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.

SubscriptionDescriptionEntry.description: Represents an entry in the feed when querying subscriptions.

id.description: The URL of the GET request

published.description: The timestamp for when this subscription was published

updated.description: The timestamp for when this subscription was last updated

type.description: Type of content in subscription response

SubscriptionDescriptionFeed.description: Response from listing Service Bus subscriptions.

id.description: URL of the list subscriptions query.

title.description: The entity type for the feed.

createdAt.description: The exact time the rule was created.

RuleDescriptionEntry.description: Represents an entry in the feed when querying rules

id.description: The URL of the GET request

published.description: The timestamp for when this rule was published

updated.description: The timestamp for when this rule was last updated

type.description: Type of content in rule response

RuleDescriptionFeed.description: Response from listing Service Bus rules.

id.description: URL of the list rules query.

title.description: The entity type for the feed.

ServiceBusManagementErrorResponse.description: An error occurred. The possible HTTP status, code, and message strings are listed below

x-ms-request-id.description: A server-generated UUID recorded in the analytics logs for troubleshooting and correlation.

x-ms-version.description: The version of the REST protocol used to process the request.

parameters.name: topicName
parameters.description: The name of the queue or topic relative to the Service Bus namespace.

get.description: Get the details about the Queue or Topic with the given topicName.

put.description: Create or update a topic at the provided topicName

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: Parameters required to make or edit a topic.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Match condition for an entity to be updated. If specified and a matching entity is not found, an error will be raised. To force an unconditional update, set to the wildcard character (*). If not specified, an insert will be performed when no existing entity is found to update and a replace will be performed if an existing entity is found.

200.description: Update -- Update Topic operation completed successfully.

201.description: Created -- Create Topic operation completed successfully.

delete.description: Delete the Topic with the given topicName.

parameters.name: queueName
parameters.description: The name of the queue or topic relative to the Service Bus namespace.

get.description: Get the details about the Queue with the given queueName.

put.description: Create or update a queue at the provided queueName

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: Parameters required to make or edit a queue.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Match condition for an entity to be updated. If specified and a matching entity is not found, an error will be raised. To force an unconditional update, set to the wildcard character (*). If not specified, an insert will be performed when no existing entity is found to update and a replace will be performed if an existing entity is found.

200.description: Update -- Update Queue operation completed successfully.

201.description: Created -- Create Queue operation completed successfully.

delete.description: Delete the Queue with the given queueName.

get.description: Get the details about the subscriptions of the given topic.
Get the details about the subscription of a topic.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: Parameters required to make or edit a subscription.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Match condition for an entity to be updated. If specified and a matching entity is not found, an error will be raised. To force an unconditional update, set to the wildcard character (*). If not specified, an insert will be performed when no existing entity is found to update and a replace will be performed if an existing entity is found.

200.description: Update -- Update Subscription operation completed successfully.

201.description: Created -- Create Subscription operation completed successfully.

delete.description: Delete the subscription with the given topicName and subscriptionName.

get.summary: Get rules of a topic subscription
get.description: Get the details about the rules of the given topic subscription.
Get the details about the rule of a subscription of a topic.

parameters.name: requestBody
parameters.description: Parameters required to make or edit a rule.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: Match condition for an entity to be updated. If specified and a matching entity is not found, an error will be raised. To force an unconditional update, set to the wildcard character (*). If not specified, an insert will be performed when no existing entity is found to update and a replace will be performed if an existing entity is found.

200.description: Update -- Update Rule operation completed successfully.

201.description: Created -- Create Rule operation completed successfully.

delete.description: Delete the rule with the given topicName, subscriptionName and ruleName.

get.description: Get the details about the Service Bus namespace.

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: List all queues or all topics of the service bus. Value can be "queues" or "topics"

get.description: Get the details about the entities of the given Service Bus namespace.
